title: Ticket #5667: add width to condor_q "SIZE" column
description:
Currently, condor_q output for "SIZE" only gives 4 characters of width, even when the terminal is widened. This is causing significant confusion for users and support staff.

Example: 

[lmichael@submit-5 ~]$ condor_q nu_shenx3 -constraint "JobStatus == 2" -af RequestMemory MemoryUsage
56320 73243
56320 73243
56320 73243
56320 73243
